briefdescription.para: Wait for a thread to complete.
Get configuration object from a thread.
Get argument pointer from a thread.
Get message queue from a thread.
Send an asynchronous message to a thread.

detaileddescription.para: Each thread gets a message queue by default, so this is just a wrapper around sbmsgq_send().

briefdescription.para: Post a message to a queue.
Wait for a message from a queue.
Wait for an event to be signalled.
